DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study designed to characterize the pharmacokinetics and comparative bioavailability of Roxane Laboratories' codeine sulfate tablets after oral administration of 60 mg doses as 1 x 60 mg, 2 x 30 mg and 4 x 15 mg under fasted conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic and Comparative Bioavailability Study of Codeine Sulfate Under Fasted Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical laboratory results during screening. Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to codeine sulfate or any comparable or similar product.
